sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DK4_599
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX_Diagnosis/MeasurementValues/c/inc/DWAX_MeasurementValues.h line 249 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/DiagMasterSlave/DK2_LinDiag/c/inc/ConfigLinDiag.h line 454 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/DiagMasterSlave/DK2_LinDiag/c/inc/ConfigLinDiag.h line 504 Requirement is verified here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX_Diagnosis/MeasurementValues/c/test/swut/DWAX_MeasurementValues.c.test line 873 CRoute must ensure that the data transmitted by the DK1/2/2F LIN slaves can be transmitted or buffered with respect to length. As confirmed by VW (and Q-LAH_80124-314) the default buffer sizes are 128 bytes for DK2 and 256 bytes for DK2F slaves.
Therefore CRoute shall be able to store slave responses of 256 bytes. And CRoute shall not check the length of a received response, but just forward the complete response.
Note: There might be exceptional RDIDs with 512 bytes slave response length. This is the max. possible length.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DK4_599 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1271
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ./ComponentDesign.markdown line 415 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX_Diagnosis/MeasurementValues/c/inc/DWAX_MeasurementValues.h line 767 Requirement is verified here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX_Diagnosis/MeasurementValues/c/test/swut/DWAX_MeasurementValues.c.test line 416 Measurement Value "Bereitschaft NGS" The values shall be set as follows: "nicht aktiv"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_NGS_Status == unscharf) "Schärfungsphase"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_NGS_Schaerfungsphase == Schärfungsphase aktiv) "aktiv"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_NGS_Status == scharf) "nicht codiert / nicht verbaut"; IF (pc_DWA_mit_NGS == nicht verbaut) "keine Kommunikation"; IF (s_Timeout_DWASensors_01 == aktiv)
Measurement Value "Alarm durch NGS erkannt" The values shall be set as follows: "ja"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_NGS_Alarm == Alarm) "nein"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_NGS_Alarm == kein Alarm) "nicht codiert / nicht verbaut"; IF (pc_DWA_mit_NGS == nicht verbaut) "keine Kommunikation"; IF (s_Timeout_DWASensors_01 == aktiv) ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1271 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1272
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ./ComponentDesign.markdown line 416 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX_Diagnosis/MeasurementValues/c/inc/DWAX_MeasurementValues.h line 824 Requirement is verified here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX_Diagnosis/MeasurementValues/c/test/swut/DWAX_MeasurementValues.c.test line 542 Measurement Value "Bereitschaft IRUE Sensor" The values shall be set as follows: "inaktiv"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Status == unscharf) "Schärfungsphase"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Schaerfungsphase == Schärfungsphase aktiv) "Stufe 1"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Status == geschaerft Level 1) "Stufe 2"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Status == geschaerft Level 2) "Stufe 3"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Status == geschaerft Level 3) "Stufe 4"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Status == geschaerft Level 4) "Stufe 5"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Status == geschaerft Level 5) "Stufe 6"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Status == geschaerft Level 6) "nicht codiert / nicht verbaut"; IF (pc_DWA_mit_IRU == nicht verbaut) "keine Kommunikation"; IF (s_Timeout_DWASensors_01 == aktiv)
Measurement Value "Alarm durch IRUE erkannt" The values shall be set as follows: "ja"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Alarm == Alarm) "nein"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Alarm == kein Alarm) "nicht codiert / nicht verbaut"; IF (pc_DWA_mit_IRU == nicht verbaut) "keine Kommunikation"; IF (s_Timeout_DWASensors_01 == aktiv) ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1272 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1259
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX_Diagnosis/MeasurementValues/c/inc/DWAX_MeasurementValues.h line 879 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX_Diagnosis/MeasurementValues/c/src/DWAX_MeasurementValues.c line 432 Requirement is verified here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX_Diagnosis/MeasurementValues/c/test/swut/DWAX_MeasurementValues.c.test line 666 Measurement Values "Bereitschaft Sirene" The values shall be set as follows: "nicht aktiv"; IF (Sounders_01.Sounder_Status == unscharf) "aktiv"; IF (Sounders_01.Sounder_Status == scharf voller Empfang) "nicht verbaut"; IF (pc_DWA_mit_Einfachhorn == verbaut) "keine Kommunikation"; IF (s_Timeout_Sounders_01 == aktiv)
Measurement Values "Alarm durch Sirene erkannt" The values shall be set as follows: "ja"; IF (Sounders_01.Sounder_Alarm == Ein) "nein"; IF (Sounders_01.Sounder_Alarm == Aus)
Measurement Values "Sirene Alarmausgabe" The values shall be set as follows: "ja"; IF (Sounders_01.Sounder_Aktiv == aktiv) "nein"; IF (Sounders_01.Sounder_Aktiv == inaktiv) ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1259 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
